0.title: SPACE EXPLORATION
clues: In February 1972 a Soviet spacecraft soft-landed here & then returned rock samples to the Earth

In 1958 Explorer I discovered these radiation bands surrounding the Earth

3.title: BASEBALL'S GREATEST HITTERS

4.title: MILK
clues: Milk's content of this may be 2%, 1% or as close to "Non" as they can get it

3-letter term for a type of milk often banned
This term on milk labels often means it's enriched with vitamins A & D & protein-rich solids

11.title: FLORAL QUOTES
clues: Edmund Spenser wrote, these are "Red and violets blue, and all the sweetest flowers, that in the forest grew"

"In the beauty of" these "Christ was born across the sea with a glory in his bosom that transfigures you and me"
"In Flanders Fields" they "blow between the crosses, row on row"
